text: Mangang (Meitei: ꯃꯉꯥꯡ) is one of the seven main clans (Yek Salai) of the Meitei people in Manipur, a state in northeast India. The Mangang group includes many family names (Yumnaks) that come from the old kingdom of Kangleipak (now called Manipur). In the traditional flag of Kangleipak, the red color represents the Mangang clan. == Number of families == Meitei sub- groups Romanisation Number of families/surnames (according to N.
